name: T McClellan
review: I was diagnosed with plantar fasciitis recently and needed a stiffer soled shoe once I resumed exercise.

name: Stephen
review: Got these because I’m tired of the decline of new balance and under armor offers and extra wide size.

name: Ross
review: Under Armour shoes are very comfortable and easy on my feet.

name: Warren S
review: Great shoe, my first time buying Under Armour.

name: Mark Riddle
review: This is the second pair of these now. I wore the others out. I am a men’s size. 9.5.

name: Peter
review: I was looking for a comfortable everyday shoe suitable for casual active use. These fit the bill perfectly.
